title: Akaliza Keza Ntwari – I tried to warn you

I found this interesting to read, seeing as I’m a Rwandan who lived in the UK and is now living in Japan!
Recently, I watched a YouTube video where they filmed a young woman walking through the streets of New York city in two different outfits to show the reactions she drew.
I found this interesting to read, seeing as I’m a Rwandan who lived in the UK and is now living in Japan!
